short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NBA player stats is a web extension that displays daily and season average stats of players for users to see and compare stats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NBA player stats is a web extension that displays daily and season average stats of players for users to see and compare stats.
Users can search and sort players by selecting a stat and then add the players the want to see by clicking the player card on the dropdown.
Added players are kept in the database to be updated everytime the user wants to use the extension and check on their stats.
Users can delete the players that they added by hovering over the players and then clicking the bin icons that appear on hover.
